Title: Relates to requiring a certain percentage of the dedicated highway and bridge trust fund's revenue to be disbursed on a pay-as-you-go basis for capital projects
Summary: Relates to requiring a certain percentage of the dedicated highway and bridge trust fund's revenue be disbursed on a pay-as-you-go basis for capital projects.
LawCode: Amd ยง89-b, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to capital project spending by the dedicated highway and bridge trust fund
